price: 64 C’est réellement de cette manière que se disputeront les damnés de l’Enfer.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
